CMG Demo

Abandoned Cart Email

E-commerce Recovery CMG Demo
Created: August 2024
Last Updated: October 15, 2024
Subject Line: Your Cart is Waiting - Complete Your Purchase Today!
View HTML

About This Template

This abandoned cart recovery email template was created for e-commerce clients looking to recapture lost sales. The design is optimized to remind customers of items left in their cart and encourage completion of the purchase through compelling imagery and strategic CTAs.

Key Features

Dynamic Product Display

Automatically pulls abandoned product images, descriptions, and prices from your e-commerce platform.

Responsive Layout

Fully responsive design that looks great on all devices from desktop to mobile.

Personalization

Easy merge field integration for customer name and personalized recommendations.

Customizable Timing

Template can be configured for different abandonment durations (1 hour, 24 hours, etc.).

Design Notes

The template uses a minimalist design focused on highlighting the abandoned products. The color scheme can be easily customized to match your brand identity while maintaining accessibility standards.

The primary CTA button uses high-contrast colors to draw attention and improve click-through rates. Secondary CTAs provide alternative actions for users who aren't ready to complete their purchase.
